app.title: 7sanah

tasbeeh.acceptanceMessage: May Allah accept it from you

createKhatmah.title: Create New Khatmah
createKhatmah.namePlaceholder: Enter a name for your khatmah

createKhatmah.description: A Khatmah is a complete reading of the Quran, divided into 30 juz (parts). Create a khatmah to invite others to join you in reading the Quran together.

qibla.title: Qibla Finder
qibla.subtitle: Find the direction of the Kaaba from your location
qibla.permissionDenied: Permission denied. Please enable device orientation in your browser settings.
qibla.permissionNeeded: Device orientation access is needed to show the compass direction.
qibla.qiblaDescription: The Qibla is the direction that Muslims face during prayer. It points toward the Kaaba in Mecca, Saudi Arabia. This compass uses your device's orientation sensors and your current location to calculate the direction of the Qibla.

compass.title: Compass
compass.iOSPermissionNeeded: iOS requires permission to use the compass. Please tap 'Allow Access' below.
compass.notSupported: Compass is not supported on your device.
compass.calibrationNeeded: Compass needs calibration. Wave your device in a figure-8 pattern.
compass.calibrationTip: If compass direction is off, adjust it with these controls.
compass.holdDeviceFlat: 1. Hold your device flat and level
compass.moveInFigure8: 2. Move your device in a figure-8 pattern
compass.enableLocation: Enable location services to display Qibla direction
compass.grantPermission: To access this feature, permission must be granted
compass.deviceOrientationNotSupported: Device orientation is not supported on your device
compass.permissionDenied: User denied the request for Geolocation.
compass.positionUnavailable: The location information is not available.
compass.timeout: The attempt to obtain location has timed out.
compass.locationNote: Location needs to be enabled for the qibla to appear

ageCalculator.title: Age Calculator
ageCalculator.description: Calculate your age in both Gregorian and Hijri calendars and discover more information.
ageCalculator.hijriExplanation: Your Hijri age differs from your Gregorian age because the Hijri year is 354.36 days while the Gregorian year is 365.25 days. There's a difference of about 11 days each year, which is why your Hijri age is greater than your Gregorian age, and this difference increases as you get older.
ageCalculator.birthdayDay: Your Next Birthday Will Be On
ageCalculator.calculationError: Error calculating age. Please try again.
